purpose: To revolutionize the gourmet food industry by delivering exceptional quality products that inspire culinary creativity and bring joy to every meal
mission: We source the finest ingredients from around the world, partner with artisan producers, and deliver premium gourmet experiences directly to customers' homes
vision: To become the global leader in premium gourmet food delivery, recognized for our uncompromising quality, sustainable practices, and customer satisfaction
positioning: The only gourmet food service that combines Michelin-star quality with the convenience of home delivery, backed by our 100% satisfaction guarantee
keyMessages: We bring the world's finest foods to your table
Every product is carefully curated by our expert team
Sustainability and quality go hand in hand
differentiators: Only company with direct relationships with 500+ artisan producers

proofPoints.claim: We serve over 100,000 satisfied customers nationwide
proofPoints.evidence: Based on our customer database as of December 2024
Survey of 5,000 customers conducted in Q3 2024

proofPoints.claim: We partner with 500 artisan producers across 30 countries
proofPoints.evidence: Verified supplier contracts and partnership agreements

proofPoints.claim: We are the #1 rated gourmet food delivery service
proofPoints.evidence: Ranked first among 20 competitors in independent study

proofPoints.claim: Average order value increased from $75 to $120
We reduced food waste by 40% since 2022

proofPoints.evidence: Based on cohort analysis of 2024 customers

targetAudience.secondary: Young professionals interested in premium experiences

competitiveAdvantages: Expert curation team with culinary backgrounds
